What are the common symptoms of a stroke.generation: The most common symptoms of a stroke include: numbness or tingling in the face, arm or leg, trouble speaking or understanding speech, confusion or dizziness, loss of balance or trouble walking, and loss of vision or trouble seeing. What treatments are available for stroke.generation: There are several treatments available for stroke, depending on the type and severity of the stroke and the individual patient.
